net.corda.finance.flows

Class CashPaymentFlow

  • AbstractCashFlow
    • net.corda.finance.flows.CashPaymentFlow

  • @StartableByRPC
 @InitiatingFlow
public class CashPaymentFlow
extends AbstractCashFlow

    Initiates a flow that sends cash to a recipient.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CashPaymentFlow

        public CashPaymentFlow(@NotNull
                       net.corda.core.contracts.Amount<java.util.Currency> amount,
                       @NotNull
                       net.corda.core.identity.Party recipient,
                       boolean anonymous,
                       @NotNull
                       net.corda.core.utilities.ProgressTracker progressTracker,
                       @NotNull
                       java.util.Set<net.corda.core.identity.Party> issuerConstraint,
                       @Nullable
                       net.corda.core.identity.Party notary)

        Initiates a flow that sends cash to a recipient.

        Parameters:
        amount - the amount of a currency to pay to the recipient.
        recipient - the party to pay the currency to.
        anonymous - whether to anonymous the recipient party. Should be true for normal usage, but may be false
        issuerConstraint - if specified, the payment will be made using only cash issued by the given parties.
        notary - if not specified, the first notary of the network map is selectedfor testing purposes.

      • CashPaymentFlow

                       net.corda.core.contracts.Amount<java.util.Currency> amount,

        A straightforward constructor that constructs spends using cash states of any issuer.
